text: Good afternoon, I need to be able to read the products related to the deals through the api de deals

Hi <@UFLT44U20>, you can accomplish this by using the Get Associations Endpoint  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/get-associations> In this case youâ€™ll use definition ID 19 (the full list can be found at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/crm-associations-overview>) and then you can look those up their ID at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/line-items/get_line_item_by_id> or <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/line-items/batch-get-line-items>
